Name: World of relish
About the game: Cute girls need your help in this inconspicuous and cozy village. So will you be able help them to solve their problems? A lot of mini games and puzzles are waiting for you, enjoy it! Game features: This game is mix of puzzles, stuff searching and other kinds of mini games. Ten nice girls with unique appearances and characters are waiting for you here. This pleasant and atmospheric visual style would immerse you in an amazing trip! The great soundtrack would create needed mood!
